description: The classic brain-training puzzle game KenKen, enjoyed by millions around the world, arrives exclusively on your Touchpad. This unofficial version of the famous puzzle game is a brain-boosting challenge that will have you addicted in no time. With a gameplay mechanic similar to Sudoku each puzzle is a brain straining and training exercise in logic. The Media states that the original game is - - The Most addictive puzzle since Sudoku (Will Shortz NY Times) - Sneakily addictive (PocketGamer) - My latest puzzle love (Stephen Shankland CNET) The game features - - More than 500 puzzles - Gridsizes from 3 to 7 (soon from 3 to 9) - Pencil & Eraser system - Back and forward system
